00002 using System.Collections.Generic;
00003 using System.Linq;
00004 using System.Text;
00005 using RobotFootballCore.Interfaces;
00006 using RobotFootballCore.RouteObjects;
00007 using System.Drawing;
00008 using RobotFootballCore.Objects;
00009 using RobotFootballCore.Utilities;
00010 using System.Threading.Tasks;
00011 using MathNet.Numerics.LinearAlgebra;
00012 
00013 namespace RouteFinders
00014 {
00015     public class MassedPotentialFieldRouteFinder : RouteFinder
00016     {
00017         public override Route FindPath(PointF startPoint, PointF endPoint, Field field, IPositionedObject movingObject)
00018         {
00019             var attractiveConstant = 1;
00020             var repulsiveConstant = -5000000;
00021             var repulsiveDistance = 150;
00022             var timestep = 0.1;
00023             var mass = 40;
00024             var flowResistance = 0.1;
00025 
00026             var currentVelocity = new Vector(2, 0);
00027             var currentPosition = new Vector(new double[] { startPoint.X, startPoint.Y });
00028             var endVector = new Vector(new double[] { endPoint.X, endPoint.Y });
00029 
00030             var route = new Route();
00031             var distance = endVector - currentPosition;
00032 
00033             while (distance.Norm() > 10)
00034             {
00035                 var attractForce = attractiveConstant * distance;
00036                 var repulseForce = new Vector(new[] { 0.0, 0.0 });
00037 
00038                 //var distance = new SizeF(currentPosition.X - endPoint.X, currentPosition.Y - endPoint.Y).Scale(-1);
00039                 
00040                 //var attractForce = distance.Scale(attractiveConstant);
00041 
00042                 //SizeF repulsiveForce = SizeF.Empty;
00043 
00044                 foreach (var p in field.Players.Where(p => p.Team == Team.Opposition))
00045                 {
00046                     var playerPos = new Vector(new double[] { p.Position.X, p.Position.Y });
00047                     var opDistance = playerPos - currentPosition;
00048                     var distMag = opDistance.Norm();
00049                     if (distMag > repulsiveDistance)
00050                         continue;
00051                     var directionVector = opDistance.Normalize();
00052                     var force = repulsiveConstant * directionVector / (distMag * distMag);
00053                     repulseForce += force;
00054                 }
00055 
00056                 var totalForce = attractForce + repulseForce;
00057 
00058                 var angle = Math.Abs(Math.Acos(Vector.ScalarProduct(currentVelocity, attractForce) / (currentVelocity.Norm() * attractForce.Norm())));
00059                 if (angle < Math.PI/2)
00060                 {
00061                     var rotMat = new Matrix(new[] { new[] { Math.Cos(145), -Math.Sin(145) }, new[] { Math.Sin(145), Math.Cos(145) } });
00062                     attractForce = (rotMat * repulseForce.ToColumnMatrix()).GetColumnVector(0);
00063                     totalForce = attractForce + repulseForce;
00064                 }
00065 
00066                 currentVelocity += totalForce * timestep / mass;
00067                 currentVelocity -= flowResistance * currentVelocity;
00068                 var oldPosition = currentPosition;
00069                 currentPosition += currentVelocity * timestep;
00070                 route.Path.Add(new LineSegment(new PointF((float)oldPosition[0], (float)oldPosition[1]), new PointF((float)currentPosition[0], (float)currentPosition[1])));
00071                 if (route.Path.Count > 80000)
00072                     break;
00073                 distance = endVector - currentPosition;
00074             }
00075 
00076             return route;
00077         }
00078     }
00079 }
